name: BenchmarkAnything
body:
### About

A common schema and tools in different languages and systems to store and process benchmark results.

### Libraries

* [schema validation and tools](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Schema)
* [database backend store](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Schema)

### Authors and Contributors

* Roberto Sch√§fer (@schaefr-aws)
* Steffen Schwigon (@renormalist)
